item.title: PiDVR Record over the air TV on a Raspberry Pi 4
item.description: About the project The following project explains how I used a Raspberry Pi 4 to create a personal digital video recorder to record over-the-air tv. Required Hardware This project requires the following hardware: Raspberry Pi 4 (with the required parts) 4GB of ram A 16GB SD card A micro HDMI cable Monitor with HDMI input A 15.3W USB-C Power Supply (3A @ 5v power supply) Raspberry Pi 4 case.
